overview: The story of Eduardo, a painter of violent strokes, bipolar and drug user, who is reunited after more than five years with his tormented love on the day of the latter's marriage, Christian, a journalist full of taboos and prejudices about sexuality, who in the past got mixed up with Eduardo in a passionate relationship that neither of the  two men knew how to handle, either because of the fear of one or the outburst of the other.
title: Íntimos relatos
